sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function About() { return (

A Dream Reignited

The Birth of Lume by Langelihle

My name is Langelihle Mpanza, and I'm a 25-year-old woman who's always carried a deep love for fashion. Somewhere along the way, life happened - and I lost touch with that passion. But dreams have a beautiful way of calling us back, louder and stronger than before.

It's always been my dream to work with iconic fashion brands, especially those that celebrate and empower women through trend-forward, bold, and stylish pieces. I saw a gap - not just in the market, but in my own heart - and decided it was time to fill it.

So here I am, turning passion into purpose, with the launch of my very own online boutique: Lume by Langelihle.

Lume is all about confidence, energy, and glow. We're kicking things off with hot summer essentials and gym wear â€” curated for the modern woman who knows what she wants and owns her shine. From beach days to gym slays, this is for YOU.

It's summer, and we're taking it into our own hands.

Thank you for being part of this new journey. Here's to rediscovering dreams, showing up boldly, and looking damn good while doing it.

With love,

Langelihle Mpanza

Founder, Lume by Langelihle

); } export default About;
